name: Paint the snow RED
description:
Yeah, so this is my submission for the 2019 Christmas Game Jam. If you would like to, play it and leave feedback here  or at the game's  jam page. It is a quite fun, and pretty polished top down shooter. You play as santas cousin "The butcher " and you  need to save santa by killing, killing and killing.  

However, I did not get as much detail and originality as I thought I would be able to from the beginning, but I  might  update this with an after jam version with just a bit more detail.

And just gonna put a WARNING: GORE! here since I may have forgot about that  in the game.

Controls: (also displayed in tutorial)

-WASD to move

-Mouse to aim

-Left mouse button to shoot

-Right mouse button to throw your gun

-E to pick up new gun

-O to go back to menu

Objective:

Free santa by clearing every each one of the 25 levels from enemies and get every key on each map. That's it. 

Good luck and hope you  have fun! :D
